summary: My custom InjectFX settings file (injFX_Settings.h). Color correcting, slight sharpening, AA, etc.
descriptionHtml:
My custom InjectFX settings file (injFX_Settings.h). I do not believe any other version (or default version) had correct settings for color correcting, slight sharpening, AA, etc. So I made this one, and decided to upload it here for others that are not satisfied with existing versions or having trouble spending time to tweak their own. 

I edited the file for maximum color correction, slight sharpening (less than default) and good AA settings. See screenshots for yourself!

===Comparison Screenshots=====
Solitude: [url=http://i.imgur.com/RqGCR.jpg]Vanilla[/url] - [url=http://i.imgur.com/QOe8t.jpg]Modsoft[/url]
Boat:  [url=http://i.imgur.com/ZoNrA.jpg]Vanilla[/url] - [url=http://i.imgur.com/1Qnw7.jpg]Modsoft[/url]
Docks: [url=http://i.imgur.com/C0eOU.jpg]Vanilla[/url] - [url=http://i.imgur.com/49D0o.jpg]Modsoft[/url]
Markarth: [url=http://i.imgur.com/BMt34.jpg]Vanilla[/url] - [url=http://i.imgur.com/XsR9n.jpg]Modsoft[/url]
Night 1: [url=http://i.imgur.com/77GJC.jpg]Vanilla[/url] - [url=http://i.imgur.com/Y2pD0.jpg]Modsoft[/url]
Night 2: [url=http://i.imgur.com/N8dZn.jpg]Vanilla[/url] - [url=http://i.imgur.com/7154n.jpg]Modsoft[/url]
Riverwood: [url=http://i.imgur.com/RMfth.jpg]Vanilla[/url] - [url=http://i.imgur.com/UaJZw.jpg]Modsoft[/url]

===Changelog=================

-Archive now includes dX9 & dX10 versions

====Features==================

-Balances colors appropriately
-Reduces a bit of the \'washed-out\' colors/effects seen in the vanilla game
-Reduces yellowish tinge
-proper blueshift, and whitening
-more realistic tones
-no noticeable performance hit!

===Other=====================
Tested on an nVidia/intel machine (GTX260/i5) so I\'m not sure about ATi setups. Should work the same though. Especially if you are just replacing the settings file.

Other mods I recommend:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=337]Skyrim Tweaks Complete[/url] (ini tweaks)

I may be continuing to tweak this into the future!

====Install====================

+Use the \'tweaked settings file\' download to just download the \'injFX_settings.h\' file, used to replace the settings file for users that have injFX set up already.
	-Replace existing injFX_settigns.h file

+Use \'injectFX and tweaked settings\' to download the injFX files as well as my tweaked settings file. Just drop it into the skyrim folder (same as exe)
	-Copy either dX9 or dX10 version to the root of the Skyrim game folder depending on your directX version

============================

~Modsoft
(I take no credit for injectFX, etc.)
author: Modsoft
